law.catch_line: Money in the Fund may be used to make a deferred payment loan to an approved applicant to:...

text.section:
Money in the Fund may be used to make a deferred payment loan to an approved applicant to:
acquire, construct, or rehabilitate an elderly rental housing project; or
convert existing rental housing to an elderly rental housing project.
A deferred payment loan under this section may be subordinate to other financing.
